packageMeta.name: purescript-dispatcher-react
packageMeta.description: A simple action dispatcher for purescript-react

children.comments: An instance of `Dispatchable` for optionally dispatching an action using `Maybe`
children.title: funcMaybeDispatch

declarations.comments: The type of all React action handling functions
declarations.title: ReactReaderT

declarations.comments: The type of React lifecycle methods - Reader Writer State (RWS) with the eval being the Reader type and the ReactSpec being the State type.
declarations.title: ReactLifecycle

declarations.comments: Run an effect with on the object pointed to by the ref string. (or do nothing if it doesn't exist)
declarations.title: unsafeWithRef

declarations.comments: Create a ReactClass with the given state, renderer and action evaluator
declarations.title: createComponent

declarations.comments:
Create a ReactClass with the given initialstate function, renderer and action evaluator
The initialstate function must return it's state value wrapped in the `ReactState` newtype
declarations.title: createComponent'

declarations.comments: Create a ReactClass with the given lifecycle, state, renderer and action evaluator
declarations.title: createLifecycleComponent

declarations.comments:
Create a ReactClass with the given lifecycle, initialstate function, renderer and action evaluator
The initialstate function must return it's state value wrapped in the `ReactState` newtype
declarations.title: createLifecycleComponent'

declarations.comments: A ReactLifecycle for dispatching the `componentDidMount` React lifecycle function
declarations.title: didMount

declarations.comments: A ReactLifecycle for dispatching the `componentWillUnmount` React lifecycle function
declarations.title: willUnmount

declarations.comments:
A newtype to signify the React State
Used to denote the state returned from an initial state function
declarations.title: ReactState

declarations.comments:
A newtype representing the React Props
Useful in renderers or initial state functions
declarations.title: ReactProps

declarations.comments:
A newtype representing the React children array
Useful in renderers
declarations.title: ReactChildren
